channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged Car abandoned for 2 weeks, 4th July
item.description:
Car abandoned for 2 weeks now - severe damage to front and appears dumped

item.title: Bollard missing (again) on Clonbrock Rd N16, 4th July
item.description:
The bollard which stops traffic driving thru the filter has yet again been vandalised. Please can you re-instate the bollard on Clonbrock Rd and this time lock it up. Thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish left out on correct day again, 4th July
item.description:
Once again a neighbour has left the black bins out late and on the wrong day. This is a hazard as outside our property and we have to move it each week. Can you please inform estate residents via notices and remove this?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Daubeney Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Flytipping - continuous and serious issue, 4th July
item.description:

item.title: Dangerous tree r/o school cottages, rectory lane, Sidcup, 4th July
item.description:
Dangerous tree r/o school cottages, rectory lane, Sidcup. The tree is to the back of Rectory Lane are dangerously over grown – had an email to say case closed and nothing was done – the branches have been falling and they are on average 6 foot long and crash down onto properties – tree needs trimming back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 166, Rectory Lane, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poorly visible zebra crossing, 4th July
item.description:
- Cars do not always stop at the Zebra crossing on Ravensbourne Park. Near Ladywell Fields and not far from Ladywell Prendergast Primary and Scondary school - Paint on Zabra crossing has faded (see photos) -Ideally better / more visible poles or sign /flashing is needed -It’s very dangerous and it’s been an issue for over 6 years (when we moved to area) -Cars go very fast down this road and often speed over the crossing as it’s noticed too late -It’s used by many locals going to the park and also kids from age 5-16 years old going to school

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Ravensbourne Park, Honor Oak, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping opposite entrance to 9-12 Exeter mansions, 4th July
item.description:
Bags of household waste and garden rubbish. I bet some of it has address labels. It’s a horrible mess.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Exeter Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
